short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With SmallPDF Free you can easily manage PDFs and images from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SmallPDF Free Chrome extension offers a powerful and versatile solution for managing various documents and images online. Our feature-rich extension integrates seamlessly into your browsing experience, giving you access to all the tools available on SmallPDFFree, right when you need them.

Here are the key features of our extension:

Grab PDFs and Images: As you browse, the extension automatically detects and grabs all images (JPG, JFIF, PNG, PSD) and PDF files on the active browser tab. A preview of all detected files is displayed within the extension, allowing you to select any file and instantly open it with the relevant SmallPDFfree tools—whether you want to compress, merge, split, convert, or edit.

Screenshots: Capture and save screenshots of the active tab directly through the extension, then convert them instantly using SmallPDFfree tools. Whether it's a full web page or a specific section, our tool integrates OCR technology for seamless conversions.

Comprehensive PDF Tools:

Compress PDFs: Adjust size and quality of your PDF files to meet your requirements.
Edit PDFs: Add or modify text, forms, annotations, images, shapes, highlights and signatures in PDFs.
OCR PDFs: Make scanned or digital PDFs - text selectable and searchable with Optical Character Recognition.
Rotate PDFs: Rotate PDFs 360°, previewing and adjusting page orientation with ease.
Split PDFs: Split PDFs (small or large) into individual pages or sections as needed.
Merge PDFs: Combine PDFs and images of any size without losing formatting or quality.
Crop PDFs: Crop single or multiple pages from a PDF file with precision.
Convert: Our Converter lets you convert PDFs to Word while preserving layout, or to PowerPoint for editable presentations. Extract data with PDF to Excel for organized spreadsheets. Developers can transform PDFs into structured data with PDF to JSON, XML, YAML, or convert to PDF/A for long-term archival.

For image tasks, convert PDFs into high-quality formats like JPG/JPEG, PNG, PSD, RAW, TIFF, or encode into BASE64 for secure storage.

Our Chrome extension ensures you have the flexibility and tools to handle any PDF or image task without the need for signups, logins, or limits. With its seamless integration with wide range of tools, it's a must-have for anyone working with PDFs or images online.
